column1: #Text=Eska says : " What are we still doing here , Father ? "
#Text=Desna says : " The invasion was completely successful and the southern tribe is under our control .
#Text=Now we would like to go home .
#Text=" Unalaq says : " You do n't understand .
#Text=Everything I 've achieved so far will pale in comparison with what I 'm about to accomplish .
#Text=" Desna says : " What else is there ?
#Text=" Unalaq says : " After today , there will be no more Water Tribe ; no more nations of any kind .
#Text=The world is about to be transformed into something magnificent , and new .
#Text=And I will lead this glorious revolution .
#Text=Now go outside and get the troops ready to defend the spirit portal .
#Text=" Unalaq says : " The Avatar will be here soon .
